mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM , ITEM_CODE , (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM SHOP_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = R.ITEM_CODE) AS ITEM_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(R.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , STAR_POINT FROM REVIEW_BOARD R WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_NUM , R.ITEM_CODE , (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM SHOP_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = R.ITEM_CODE) AS ITEM_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , R.MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(R.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , STAR_POINT , REVIEW_IMG_CODE , SAVED_NAME , (SELECT ATTACHED_NAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_CODE = R.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y') AS ATTACHED_NAME FROM REVIEW_BOARD R, REVIEW_IMG I, ITEM_IMG M WHERE R.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND R.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE(+) AND R.ITEM_CODE = M.ITEM_CODE

SELECT BOARD_NUM , ITEM_CODE , (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM SHOP_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = R.ITEM_CODE) AS ITEM_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(R.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , STAR_POINT FROM REVIEW_BOARD R WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT REPLY_NUM , REPLY_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , BOARD_NUM , ITEM_CODE , TO_CHAR(REPLY_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REPLY_REG_DATE FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC
